extendedInfo.description: As seen on the Verizon commercial, Techcrunch and Wired magazine! 1st place winner in Verizon's Power Your App Contest!Save your location when you park and Car Locator will help you find your car10 uses in trial-Radar/Map/Split-Screen view-Parking timer-Beam your current or saved location to another phone/email-Home screen widget for quick save-Shake to save-Double tap on map to save -Save notes and photos-Location history-Location favorites-Manual coordinate entry-View current and car coordinates (great for geocaching)-Driving directions-Sonar sound-Customizable background images-Radar visualizations-Live wallpaper always points to your car-Customizable radar visualization-Automatically save location on bluetooth disconnect or car undock-Automatically save, sync, and import location with your Evernote accountPermissions explanation: READ_CONTACTS - Car Locator has the ability to "beam" your location to another user who has Car Locator installed. You can select the recipient of your location by using your contact listSEND_SMS/RECEIVE_SMS - The "beam" communication is done through SMS. This is why the SMS permission is required. No SMS's are sent without your explicit action. Tags: Find Car, Car Locator, Car Finder

reviews.title: Well worth the price
reviews.comment: I did some field testing and this app on my HTC LTE is accurate to an inch.  It also does not slow down my phone...very cool!
reviews.author: Bryan York

reviews.title: Not useful
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t a GPS signal in airport parking garage to save the car\'s location, so this app is of no use there. Will try Walmart parking lot next.
reviews.author: Tommy D

reviews.title: Expensive
reviews.comment: Crazy price without offline map - upgrade first with offline map then sale $ 5 ---- LOL
reviews.author: Jaya Saputra

reviews.title: Solid application
reviews.comment: Worked well the first time out of the box and every time only used 4 of the trial cycles and then made a purchase
reviews.author: Reuven Gruber

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Used this at the Daytona 500. Love the radar view. Located my car without any problem.
reviews.author: Dale Solander

reviews.title: Never used
reviews.comment: I installed it thinking it might be of use, but by the time I went to use it, it said trial expired. Not gonna buy it if I don\'t know if it works
reviews.author: John Wiese

reviews.title: Randomly opens itself.
reviews.comment: Worked well the one time I got to use it, but it randomly opens itself (about once per week) and has burned through all of the trial uses by doing so.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Korrie Smallwood
reviews.comment: Went to a strange mall the other day. My friends forgot where they parked the car. Luckily I had started my car locator app. It pointed us to the car and we found it very quickly. Worked very well.
reviews.author: Korrie Smallwood

reviews.title: ANGRY!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This app opens on its own and burned half my trials and haven\'t even used it once! Yep not buying this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: sorry but all these apps that  require gps to locate your car are stupid because you can get the gps lock inside a parking garage ... Just record a voice memo or snap a pic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PRIVACY-ALERT!!   -DatenSammler!!
reviews.comment: Why do they want my Contacts, SMS, Call-details, Emails, Storage access,... ???   Do NOT let any App save Privat data!! ACHTUNG-  Speichert Kontakte,SMS, Anruf-details, E-Mail,.... !!!
reviews.author: Dc Cor

reviews.title: Car finder
reviews.comment: Well and goooooood!!!!!!!!!!!
